Booking Start:
Your server is being booked...
This may take some time.
Details will be sent via private message when the server is ready.
Booking Already Exists:
You have already booked a server
Use `unbook` command to remove your booking.
If you recently used 'unbook' then please wait until the previous server has been closed.
Booking Limit Reached: The maximum amount of free bookable servers for your location has been reached. Please try again later or you can check-out <https://www.patreon.com/qixalite> to gain access to our exclusive server pool.
Booking Failed: Your server has failed to start. Please try again later.
Booking Details Not Found: No booking found with that ID.
Booking Details Sent:
Your server details have been sent via private message.
Please open a ticket in #support if you have any issues.
Booking Details Failed to Send: Failed to send server details via private message due to unknown error. Please contact support.
Booking Details Failed to Send due to Pr: Failed to send server details via private message. This is generally due to privacy settings in discord. Check-out <https://docs.qixalite.com/support/tf2/#not-receiving-bot-messages>
Multi Booking Limit Reached: You have reached maximum number of multi booking that is allowed.
Multi Booking Restricted: Multiple bookings is only accessible to **Tier 3** subscribers. Check-out <https://www.patreon.com/qixalite>
Unbooking Not Found: You do not have any booking with us.
Unbooking Failed: Your server has failed to stop. Please try again later.
Unbooking Success: Your server has been closed. Thank you for using our service, if you have any suggestions you can post them in #feedback.
Admin Booking Start: Server will be booked and details will be sent via private message to {{user}}
Admin Booking Failed: Server booking for the user has failed to start. Please try again later.
Admin Unbooking Failed: Failed to stop the user's server. Please try again later.
Unbooking Start:
Your server is being closed...\nThis may take some time.
Please wait until unbooking completes before booking again.
User Is Bot: Giving bookings to bots may result in world domination. Your welcome! ;)
Unknown Region: Unknown region or currently that region is not supported.
Restricted Region: Currently {{region}} region is only allowed to few testers, contact us if you are interested to try it.
Command Unbook Usage:
Usage: unbook
You can only unbook your own server.
Command Error: Looks like there are some issues. Please try again later.
